introduction_ideas.text: La preocupación más notoria de nuestro grupo de damas fue el depender de un hombre que pudiera no estar o no tener la posibilidad de suplir sus necesidades.

ideas.heading: God disciplines his children when they sin

biblicallyJustifiedIdeaList.text: The persistant incredulity and rebelion of Israel was punished with the privation of the promised land
Some disciplinary consecuences were collective, others individual
Generally God's discipline touches all, independantly of the visibility of the believer (there are some exceptions like David and Solomon)
God's discipline, even when severe, is a marvelous saving gift for his children
God's discipline is only poored over the true believers of this church, false believers are just judged and hardened for their condemnation
